author: Vonng (rh@vonng.com)
description: PGSQL Tables overview of single database

targets.expr:
max by (relname) (pg_table_n_dead_tup{ins="$ins", datname="$datname"} / 
(pg_table_n_live_tup{ins="$primary", datname="$datname"} + pg_table_n_dead_tup{ins="$primary", datname="$datname"}))

panels.description:
Index Scan + Seq Scan on this table per second.

Size by table size, Color by table scan rate.
panels.title: Table Size & Access

panels.description: Index Scan + Seq Scan on this table per second
panels.title: Table Scan (scan/s)

panels.description: Rate of tuples been sequential scanned
panels.title: Sequential Scan -- Scanned Tuples

panels.description: How many analyze (auto + manual) executed in last 1m on each table
panels.title: Analyze (1m)

list.description: IP address of this postgres instance
list.label: IP
list.name: ip

list.description: Sequence number of this instance, which is an unique integer among a postgres cluster
list.label: Sequence
list.name: seq

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls

list.description: Node name of current postgres instance
list.label: Node
list.name: node

title: PGSQL Tables
